content:
MCJOHN974 opened PR #7077 from near:viktar/zk-wasm to bytecodealliance:main:

(WIP)
Here I added script for easy run and test zkasm. Currently it need proverjs installed in same repo as wasmtime is. Further I will add automatic mode that downlads all necessary files for proving and proverjs preinstalled will not needed. Also will try to add this script to CI.
